about.me: Why ZPCT? - ZPCT pool is a strong believer of the Cardano philosophy, providing you, the cherished delegator with maximum rewards on their staked ADA. ZPCT does this by offering the lowest possible operator fees - zero percent (0%). - Always & Forever! *** Who’s behind ZPCT pool? - ZPCT is maintained to the highest standard by Adam Matthews - a freelance IT consultant and passionate technologist, proudly sporting 20 years’ experience building dependable & secure IT systems. *** Thank you for staking with ZPCT, you charming devil you!
about.server: ZPCT pool cruises along on high-spec, over-provisioned bare metal systems paired with redundant failover cloud nodes. All of which provide the highest possible performance and uptime.
